sourcesContent:
import Carousel from "react-elastic-carousel"; import useFecth from "./usefectch"; const TvShowsNow = () => { const url ='https://api.themoviedb.org/3/tv/on_the_air?api_key=05b670c12d1973fe82919a005ef06481'; const {data:nowplaying, isPending, error, setUrl} = useFecth(url); const base_url = 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500'; const breakPoints = [ { width: 1, itemsToShow: 1, itemsToScroll:1}, { width: 550, itemsToShow: 2, itemsToScroll:2}, { width: 850, itemsToShow: 3, itemsToScroll:3}, { width: 1150, itemsToShow: 4, itemsToScroll:4}, { width: 1450, itemsToShow: 5, itemsToScroll:5}, { width: 1750, itemsToShow: 6, itemsToScroll:6}, ] return(
GET LATEST TV SHOWS
NOW PLAYING
{nowplaying && nowplaying.results.map((tvShow)=>

{tvShow.name}

)}
); } export default TvShowsNow;
